üñ•Ô∏è IT Support Intern ‚Äî Birbank

Summer (1st year)

During the summer of my first year, I worked as an IT Support Intern at Birbank, gaining hands-on experience in a professional IT environment. I supported users by troubleshooting hardware and software issues, assisting with system and connectivity problems, and providing on-site IT support.

üèÜ FinTech Hackathon ‚Äî Tenity & IDDA

Nov 14‚Äì16

From November 14 to 16, I participated in the FinTech Hackathon organized by Tenity in collaboration with the Innovation and Digital Development Agency (IDDA). Together with my team BANM ADA Fusion, we developed BofiAI, an AI-powered financial assistant that helps users improve spending habits, plan purchases, and predict future financial risks using secure Open Banking data.
